name: Personal Collection Database Web Application
short_description: This open source application is designed to bring the control and data management capabilities of an enterprise level database to the average user in a simple, easy to use OS independent application.  It will harness the flexibility and power of Postgres and the web to deliver content in an easy to use and manipulate format within the convenience of a modern browser.  The initial focus of the application will be on cataloging a comic book collection but the ability to catalog other collections could be added at a later date as resources become available.
